footer.tagline: Prioritizing what matters most to the user.

home.heroDescription: Bonhoeffer – A brand that does not need any introduction in Latin America. After the success of Latin America (the biggest agriculture machinery Indian exporter in Latin America), we decided to do something bigger in India, and that’s why we launched Mechnova. Bonhoeffer Machines Private Limited founded the brand. Bonhoeffer is already in India, and from Bonhoeffer, we have a wide range of agricultural machinery, including power weeders, water pumps, engines, brush cutters, blowers, knapsack sprayers, hedge trimmers, lawn mover and chainsaws. Now, from the trusted brand, which is available in more than 22 countries, you can also buy an affordable range of machinery, which is Mechnova Agriculture Machinery.

about.title: Become a Mechnova Machines Dealer Today
about.reason1: Join the dealer network of Mechnova Machines in India and avail partnership with the leading brand backed by Bonhoeffer. A brand which is present in more than 22 countries. We are the trust of millions of farmers, and our products provide reliable machines and best support after sales.
about.reason2: From power weeders and water pumps to chainsaws and brush cutters, Mechnova products are designed for durability, easy operation, and strong market demand. Partner with a fast-growing brand, get access to quality machines, dealer support, and attractive margins — and bring reliable mechanization solutions to farmers in your area. Limited dealership opportunities available

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description1: At Mechnova, we are passionate about powering progress in agriculture, gardening, and industry through reliable, innovative, and affordable machinery. Backed by years of experience in international trade and engineering excellence, we bring to market a diverse portfolio of machines including brush cutters, chainsaws, sprayers, engines, generators, pumps, and more—designed to meet the evolving needs of modern users.
aboutSection.description2: We work closely with importers, wholesalers, and retailers to provide not just machines, but full-fledged business support—ensuring high-quality products, strong warranties, marketing assistance, and unmatched after-sales service. Whether it's a small garden or a large-scale agro-industrial operation, Mechnova is your trusted partner for performance and reliability.

segments.title: Complete Farming Machinery Under One Roof — Mechnova Machines
segments.subpara: We have a complete farming machinery range under one roof, such as Power Tillers, Gasoline Water Pumps, Gasoline Engines, Brush Cutter and Chainsaws.

gardeningForestry.title: Clear More Ground in Less Time -Mechnova Grass Cutting Machines
gardeningForestry.description: Are you looking for an ideal grass cutting machine which is more durable and powerful in terms of operation? You can clear more ground in less time with the best brush cutters by Mechnova Machines. The Mechnova Side Pack and Backpack Brush Cutters are not only powerful tools for trimming grass and weeds, but both models are durable and affordable. These grass cutting machines come with a powerful petrol engine for smooth and reliable performance. When we talk about the side pack brush cutter, then we can say that it is well-balanced for everyday field work, while the backpack brush cutter is designed for extra comfort during long working hours. These machines are easy to start comes with adjustable handles and have low vibration.

fumigation.title: Cut Faster. Work Stronger - Mechnova Chainsaw
fumigation.description: Mechnova Chainsaw delivers powerful cutting performance for wood, trees and farm maintenance tasks. It is lightweight machine with ergonomic design and provide excellent control and comfort during long working hours. A reliable design and sharp cutting precision, it is a dependable tool for farmers. The gasoline chainsaw from Mechnova Machines is built for high-power cutting performance in forestry, landscaping, applications. It is powered by robust 58CC 2-stroke engine delivering up to 3.2 HP. Guide bard of Mechnova tree cutting machine is 18-inch and durable .325″ chain for fast, precise wood cutting. With a high maximum RPM of 12,500, balanced fuel and oil capacity, and easy handling design, this chainsaw ensures smooth operation even in demanding conditions.

diesel.title: Reliable Water. Relentless Performance – Gasoline Water Pumps
diesel.description: Mechnova Gasoline Water Pump ensures fast and reliable water transfer for irrigation, construction and daily agricultural needs. Powered by a fuel-efficient engine, these pumps deliver high flow output in a compact and durable design. These pumps are easy to operate and built for tough environments. Mechnova pumps are reliable, powerful, and efficient for water transfer across agricultural fields, construction sites and rural applications. These are the high-quality water pumps with a high-performance petrol engine and self-priming system. It delivers strong pumping capacity for irrigation, drainage and emergency water movement.

domestic.title: Petrol Engine
domestic.description: Simple, compact tools for everyday home and garden tasks. Electric pressure washers and gasoline vacuum blower for small gardens, vehicles, and light-duty work.

agroIndustrial.title: Master Every Field with Mechnova Power Weeders
agroIndustrial.description: We have two models in the range of mini tractor or power weeder, and these are the 7 HP Petrol weeders for agriculture. These weeders have 208 CC function. Mechnova Power Weeder is designed to make farming easier and faster by efficiently removing weeds and preparing soil in one go. Built with a high torque engine and rugged body, it performs smoothly even in hard soil conditions. It significantly reduces manual labour while improving crop productivity. Mechnova Power Weeder backed by Bonhoeffer Machines is a compact, yet powerful farm mechanization solution designed to simplify soil preparation and weed control for Indian farms. This weeder is built with a high-performance petrol engine, adjustable handlebars and forward reverse gearbox operation. This machine delivers efficient tillage with consistent depth and wide cutting coverage. Both machines are ideal for inter-cultivation, seedbed preparation and small to medium landholdings. This machine reduces manual labour while improving productivity and making it a reliable partner for faster farming and better crop outcomes.

agriculture.title: Agriculture / Farm Mechanization
agriculture.description: Mechnova supports modern farming and agriculture needs with reliable machines like power weeders and brush cutters. Tillers are those helpful tools which simplify soil preparation, weed control, and crop maintenance. Weeders are designed to reduce manual effort and improve productivity.

forestry.title: Industrial Machinery
forestry.description: Mechnova industrial machinery like engines are top-grade equipment engines and equipment power multiple applications across manufacturing and utility operations. With consistent output and rugged construction, these machines are trusted for the long working hours in demanding environments.

agroindustrial.title: Irrigation Machines
agroindustrial.description: Mechnova irrigation solutions ensure efficient water movement for farms and construction sites alike and gasoline water pumps are the right example for this. High-flow water pumps combined with fuel-efficient engines provide dependable performance, helping users manage water resources smoothly even in remote or tough conditions.

domestic.title: Landscaping
domestic.description: From clearing overgrown areas to maintaining open spaces, Mechnova’s landscaping equipment delivers clean results with minimal physical strain. Designed for balance, comfort, and power, these machines make grass cutting, bush clearing, and land maintenance faster and more professional.

greenhouses.title: Forestry
greenhouses.description: Mechnova forestry tools are engineered for powerful cutting and field durability. Whether it’s tree trimming or wood processing, these machines offer precision, control, and reliability—supporting forestry workers with equipment that performs consistently in rugged outdoor conditions.

social.title: Become a Mechnova Machines Dealer Today
social.description: Join the dealer network of Mechnova Machines in India and avail partnership with the leading brand backed by Bonhoeffer. A brand which is present in more than 22 countries. We are the trust of millions of farmers, and our products provide reliable machines and best support after sales. From power weeders and water pumps to chainsaws and brush cutters, Mechnova products are designed for durability, easy operation, and strong market demand. Partner with a fast-growing brand, get access to quality machines, dealer support, and attractive margins — and bring reliable mechanization solutions to farmers in your area. Limited dealership opportunities available — start your Mechnova journey today.

data.name: Luis Fernando
data.message: We've been using Mechnova water pumps for our coffee farm irrigation, and the performance has been outstanding. It's reliable even during long-hour usage. Definitely worth the investment.

data.name: Ana Gabriela Torres
data.message: The backpack sprayer is easy to use and covers a lot of ground. Only wish the battery lasted slightly longer, but overall it's a great machine for greenhouse work.

data.name: Ramesh Iyer
data.message: I bought a Mechnova brush cutter for my farm in Tamil Nadu. It cuts through thick grass like butter. The engine is smooth, and it's lighter than other brands I've tried.

data.name: Mariana López
data.message: The chainsaw is solid, and customer service helped me get replacement parts easily. Slight delay in delivery, but machine performance made up for it.

data.name: Diego Mendez
data.message: Very impressed with the power of Mechnova's diesel generator. We use it for both farm and home backup, and it hasn't failed us once. Quiet and efficient!

data.name: Kavita Sharma
data.message: The vacuum blower I purchased for my garden is compact and gets the job done without any fuss. Packaging could be better, but functionality is top-notch.

house.heading: Our Partner Brands
house.subheading: Meet the Brands Built for You
house.tagline: Wondering how these brands differ when they all come from the same Bonhoeffer family? Each one serves a unique purpose and audience—from the everyday home gardener to the heavy-duty industrial operator.

questions.question: What is Mechnova Machines?
questions.answer: Mechnova offers a wide range of equipment including brush cutters, chainsaws, sprayers, generators, engines, water pumps, and domestic tools like pressure washers and vacuum blowers. These machines are suited for agricultural, forestry, fumigation, industrial, and household applications.

questions.question: Who is the founder of Mechnova?
questions.answer: Varun Gupta is the founder of Mechnova Machines and is also the founder of Bonhoeffer Machines Private Limited.

questions.question: How can I become an authorized Mechnova dealer in my district?
questions.answer: To become an authorized dealer, you need to apply for dealership with required documents such as your business details and GST documents. For more information, you can call us at +91 74286 42333.

questions.question: What products are offered by Mechnova or Bonhoeffer Machines?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of agricultural machinery including power weeders, water pumps, gasoline engines, chainsaws, brush cutters, sprayers, and more.

questions.question: How can I buy Mechnova products online?
questions.answer: If you are a customer and wish to buy Mechnova machines online, please visit our official website: shop.mechnovamachines.in.

about.title: About
about.heroDescription: Mechnova develops outdoor equipment for agriculture, garden care, power backup, and general-purpose use.
about.storyParagraph1: Our machines are designed for users who want practical performance, reliable operation, and long-term support — all at a fair price.
about.missionText: To deliver dependable, easy-to-use machines that help people work more efficiently — in fields, gardens, workshops, and homes.
about.visionText: To make reliable outdoor equipment more accessible across developing and cost-sensitive markets — by focusing on essential performance, lasting value, and long-term business relationships.

quality.title: Unmatched Quality
quality.description: Every machine is engineered for durability, performance, and ease of use—ensuring you get the best value for your investment.

support.title: Comprehensive Support
support.description: From strong warranties to marketing and after-sales service, we support our partners and customers at every step.

innovation.title: Driven by Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly evolve our product range to meet the changing needs of agriculture, gardening, and industry worldwide.

about.cta: Ready to power your progress with Mechnova?

dealer.title: Become a Dealer
dealer.consentText: You understand that when you click on submit, Mechnova and its affiliated entities will use your personal data to respond to your inquiry or request. We are committed to protecting your privacy and will always handle your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. You can find more information about how we collect, use, and share your data, your rights, and how to contact us in our full Privacy Policy. You may withdraw your consent to receive marketing communications from us at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or by reaching out to us directly.
dealer.thankYouMessage: Your inquiry has been received. Our team will get in touch with you soon.
